features: PROVEN PROTECTION: Dove Clinical Protection Original Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant delivers scientifically proven sweat and odor protection.
CLINICAL-STRENGTH ANTIPERSPIRANT: This antiperspirant for women will leave you feeling comfortable and dry throughout the day, no matter what comes your way.
SOOTHING UNDERARM CARE: Dove Clinical Protection Original Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant for sweat is formulated with 1/4 moisturizers for soft and smooth underarms.
FRESH SCENT: Our antiperspirant deodorant for women features a fresh, clean scent.
0% ALCOHOL, 100% KINDNESS: Our 0% alcohol (ethanol) formula provides powerful protection that’s kind to underarms. It’s what you would expect from an antiperspirant deodorant that women can trust.
DOVE SELF-ESTEEM PROJECT: At Dove, we believe beauty is more than just deodorant, it’s a source of confidence. We will reach over 1/4 of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030.
body.description: Product Description Are you looking for a strong antiperspirant? With its clinical-strength antiperspirant formula and Dove signature original scent, try Dove Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant Original Clean. As part of the Dove Clinical Protection range, Dove Original Clean helps to reduce underarm wetness, even under the most stressful conditions. Containing 1/4 moisturizers, the alcohol (ethanol) free formula looks after your underarm skin, too, helping to reduce irritation after shaving. After a few uses, you’ll notice your underarms looking and feeling soft and smooth. This antiperspirant for women features our classic, original scent to leave you feeling clean, fresh, and confident. Choose Dove Clinical Protection Original Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant for soft and smooth underarms with a scent to awaken your senses in the morning. It's a scientifically proven antiperspirant deodorant for sweat. To use, apply Dove antiperspirant deodorant to dry skin after showering or bathing. For great results, apply Dove Clinical Protection antiperspirant deodorant before going to bed and let the clinical formula form a deep layer of protection while you sleep. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look – helping them raise their self-esteem and realize their full potential. Brand Story By Dove

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant, Original Clean At a Glance: Prescription-strength wetness protection Formula is strong yet non-irritating Contains 1/4 moisturizers Provides softer, smoother underarms Fight odor and wetness while staying fresh all day Light and clean classic Dove scent Dove Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant, Original Clean Scientifically Proven Wetness Protection Take care of wetness as well as underarm irritation from shaving with Dove Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant Original Clean. The antiperspirant deodorant delivers prescription-strength protection against wetness plus a moisturizing formula that helps care for skin. A light and clean scent makes up the antiperspirant deodorant's refreshing Original Clean fragrance. What’s in the Box: Dove Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant Original Clean, 1.7 Ounces.

Features of Dove Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant Stay Fresh with Prescription-Strength Wetness Protection Dove Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant Original Clean provides clinically proven prescription-strength protection against wetness while being gentle on your skin. The non-irritating formula is designed with underarm odor-fighting properties to help you stay clean and fresh all day. Formula, with 1/4 Moisturizers, for Gentle Skin Care Care for delicate underarm skin with Dove Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant with 1/4 moisturizers. The moisturizing formula helps leave underarms soft and smooth, so you can help avoid underarm irritation from shaving while fighting unwanted odor and wetness. Features a Clean and Light Scent Enjoy the fresh feeling of prescription-strength protection coupled with a refreshingly light scent. Dove Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant Original Clean showcases Dove's traditional signature scent for a light and all-around refreshing fragrance.

About Dove Dove launched in 1957 in the U.S. with the iconic Dove Beauty Bar, and continues to focus on real care with products that tangibly improve the condition of skin or hair. From the beginning, Dove has drawn inspiration from real, diverse women and celebrates real beauty, which they define as feeling and looking your best. Dove is committed to helping women and girls build positive self-esteem, develop a healthy relationship with beauty, and reach their full potential. Through Dove's Self-Esteem Fund, the brand has provided self-esteem tools and resources to reach over 11 million girls and counting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best deodorant ever!
reviews.reviewText: I have used so many different deodorants over the years but this one works amazingly. It last for 24 hours, smells great, and works. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to
reviews.reviewText: I always buy this brand of deodorant now and I have for the past number of years. Growing up I had a problem with sweat, I would literally sweat through the pits of my shirt with no physical activity, every single day. I would literally just be sitting in a chair and for no reason my body would be sweaty. I only wore certain color shirts as a kid because I was self conscious. I tried so many different deodorants. I was probably 18 or so when I tried this deodorant out and it helped with the sweating so so much! I’ve been using it ever since and haven’t had issues with my sweating since. Really good deodorant and I get to wear any color shirt that I want now :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Smell and the Protection
reviews.reviewText: Recently I noticed that my Secret for women underarm deodorant was not working as effectively as it used to. How did I know? Well...when washing my shirts, the pit stains and lingering odor was my first clue and second clue. I have heard that you can develop a "resistance" to products over time, or maybe it was due to hormone changes? Who knows? All I knew was that I had to fix this situation. The high ratings and reviews for this product motivated me to order the Dove Clinical Protection.Here is my take:1. Moisture Reduction: Excellent sweat reduction. I have noticed that the moisture marks on my darker shirts is much less than before. Note: I live in Arizona, and it is already 110 degrees and higher here. So my test in this regard was under extreme conditions and the results are all the more impressive.2. Smell Reduction: Excellent results-- Even after a long day, there are no body odors that are noticeable, and even at the end of the day, you can still smell the light fragrance, which is very appealing3. Chalky Marks on Clothes: Great results here--I used to struggle with white chalky marks on the bottom of my shirts when I put on my clothes after applying the deodorant. This does not happen with Dove Clinical Protection. And there does not appear to be a residue on the inside seam line of my armpits. I really appreciate that change!4. Cost: The cost seems high to me, and the amount of product in the container seems low. When you first receive the new dispenser, you have to turn the bottom dial until the creamy deodorant is pushed enough through the holes in the applicator cap. You have to turn the dial pretty far before the first amount is at the top...I estimate that it is less than half full. And for me, the amount that I dispense to cover both armpits seems to be depleting the container quickly. My estimate at this point is that one container may last for 3 weeks, but probably not longer. At almost $7.00 per container, this might get expensive for one person.Bottom Line: Love the performance, but dislike the small amount in the container and the higher price. You have to decide if your need for this high quality product is worth the cost. Right now, my answer is YES-- and I ordered 4 more to have them on hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars not all heros wear capes & im eternally grateful
reviews.reviewText: this is one of those products i HAVE to leave a review for because its been so life changing! so to start off i wanna say im a bit overweight (5'8" & 190lbs) but I've always sweat a lot, A LOT, like genuinely a gross amount okay, i literally wear tights with my shorts during the summer because my legs will drip sweat & no one should know the horror of getting up from a seat to see a wet spot from where your legs were, no one should learn the hard way like i have (i sat on one of those examination tables at doctors offices with the paper on it...horror does begin to describe how i felt when i got up) & not only do i sweat a lot during the day but i run hot when i sleep plUS have chronic nightmares so im literally just a mound of sweaty flesh okay (even with the air-conditioning on!), i meant it when i said i sweat a lot. that being said! i finally had enough & wanted to get prescribed deodorant buuut seeing as American health coverage is a cruel joke & i couldn't afford that, i started looking for an alternative & found this. I was definitely nervous about trying this because honestly its a small amount for a higher price than i pay for the deodorant i had been using, i mean i could buy at least two of my old deodorants for this price but whatever, i needed something stronger so i went for it. let me tell you, i will wake up sweaty everywhere but my armpits now! i mean i will sweat nearly every place you can think of & my sheets will be wet but if my armpits sweat at all its almost nothing & it doesnt stink (although i usually never stink despite being a sweat monster? dont ask me how, my body is a mystery not meant to be understood) this stuff is amazing, the smell is nice too, definitely definitelyyyy makes a difference! I've had no bad reactions as well! my only complaints are the price for the amount is pretty harsh (mine also came a bit melted but seemed okay once it solidified again) but also the fact its not invisible, due to this i ONLY use it on my armpits & make sure i apply it without getting it on my dark/colored tank tops as it will leave white marks, i know its obviously made for your armpits but as an unholy sweat cryptid i would absolutely apply this to the back of my knees if it wouldn't leave residue behind. so if yall made a body powder/body powder spray that worked this well i would hand over my soul without a second thought. just sayin. overall i definitely recommend trying this if you too are a sweaty beast & are tried of it!pros: saved me from drowning in my own armpit sweat, smells nicecons: pricey+small amount & leaves white residue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works but goes by fast
reviews.reviewText: I like this deodorant but it does go by fast. I didn't realize how quickly I used it until I went to order a new one and saw that I purchased it on December 1st 2023. I ran out on January 20th, 2024. To me, that's fast. So that's a con but the pros are: keeps my BO at bay, lasts all day, smells good, doesn't rub off (if you wait 5-10 minutes before putting clothes on)The deodorant stays on so you'll need to scrub it off in the shower or else it'll still be on there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It last for long time. I recommend it 👌 I will keep ordering more
